name: rusted-chromium
description: Download legacy versions of chromium with a command-line tool

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp -r package.json bin/ out/ && cp README.md out/
scripts.release: npm run build && cd out/ && npm publish
scripts.release-github: npm run build && cd out/ && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com/

author: Bastian Gebhardt <buzz-t@buzz-t.eu>
